examples.name: 海洋风少女钥匙扣
examples.ideal_prompt: A kawaii ocean-themed keychain charm with mint green dolphin pendant and cream white starfish pendant as focal points, decorated with transparent heart bead, 12 round glass beads in pastel pink and blue tones, 2 tube beads as accents, silver lobster clasp and swivel ring attachment, macaroon color palette with soft pink blue and white, product photography, pure white background, centered composition, soft diffused studio lighting, 12cm total length

examples.name: 波西米亚复古包挂

primary: 棕色透明琥珀树脂花朵

examples.ideal_prompt: A bohemian vintage bag charm with amber resin flower pendant, baroque pearl in cream white, red coral agate bead, and woven rattan ball as main elements, decorated with 6 freshwater pearls strand, yellow enamel bead, striped glass bead, amber colored beads, 4 small gold spacer beads, braided cord tassel, antique gold lobster clasp and ring attachments, warm earth tone color palette with brown amber gold and cream, artisan handcrafted style, product photography, white background, natural lighting, 16cm length

examples.name: 海洋贝壳钥匙扣

primary: 橙红渐变白色天然贝壳

examples.ideal_prompt: A dreamy ocean-themed keychain charm with natural shell pendant in orange-red gradient to white, pink-white scallop shell pendant as focal points, decorated with 15 glass beads in pink and mint colors, 2 golden star metal charms, 1 shell-shaped metal bead, 3 clear crystal beads, 1 starfish charm, pink coated keyring and silver lobster clasp, romantic coastal color palette with coral pink mint white, product photography, pure white background, soft feminine lighting, 18cm total length

examples.name: 波西米亚蝴蝶挂饰

primary: 米白色天然石蝴蝶造型
棕褐色天然石蝴蝶造型

examples.ideal_prompt: A bohemian natural style bag charm with 3 butterfly-shaped natural stone pendants in green cream and brown colors, decorated with 3 braided cords with tassels, 9 round natural stone beads, 6 oval natural stone beads, 3 flower decorations, 15 small gold metal spacer beads, lobster clasp and metal ring attachments, earthy natural color palette with sage green cream brown, handwoven artisan style, product photography, white background, warm natural lighting, 18cm length with flowing tassels

examples.name: 糖果色童趣挂饰

primary: 透明粉白不规则造型珠

examples.ideal_prompt: A playful candy-colored charm with pink flower bead, yellow teardrop resin bead, red teardrop agate bead, translucent pink-white irregular shaped bead as main elements, decorated with rainbow braided cord, 4 pearls, 3 gold metal beads, 2 glass beads, 1 yarn pom-pom decoration, gold lobster clasp and decorative ring, vibrant candy color palette with pink yellow red and rainbow accents, whimsical handcrafted style, product photography, white background, cheerful bright lighting, 18cm length

examples.name: 梦幻星空钥匙扣
examples.ideal_prompt: A dreamy starry keychain charm with sky blue small round beads as main element, decorated with 2 golden star pendants, 4 pink accent beads, silver round metal tag charm, metal keyring and connector rings, celestial color palette with sky blue gold and soft pink, minimalist kawaii style, product photography, pure white background, soft ethereal lighting, 15cm total length, lightweight and delicate design

meta.description: 配饰设计 Few-shot 示例库，用于增强 Agent 的专业能力
